text: Lü Yi (吕亿) (born 10 April 1974) is a retired female Chinese middle distance runner who specialized in the 800 and 1500 metres. ==Achievements== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |1992 |World Junior Championships |Seoul, South Korea |bgcolor=gold align="center" | 1st |800 m |2:02.91 |- |rowspan=2|1993 |World Championships |Stuttgart, Germany |align="center" | 4th |1500 m | 4:06.06 |- |East Asian Games |Shanghai, China |bgcolor="silver" align="center" | 2nd |800 m |2:03.38 |} ==References== * Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese female middle-distance runners
title: Lü Yi (runner)
